page.title: 09Badsey First School
page.content: The school opened in the year 1895. There are 224 pupils aged between 4 years and 10. Most of the children travel from Badsey. Other children travel from Wickhamford and Aldington. The school has a headmaster and 7 teaching staff.We have a playing field and playground. The main building is now 90 years old and is made of brick. The hall is more modern with large windows. There are two temporary classrooms. We have 2 computers, A V.C.R., slide projector and a photocopier. Also we have an ancillary helper (who also controls the children crossing the road). At dinner time children bring a packed lunch and are supervised by 5 ladies.
